game_description: This is a prototype for a survival VR game. Its main purpose is to shine a new light on game mechanics within VR by focusing on player movement and dynamic 3D interactions. In this prototype, there is a tutorial world and an open world that is slowly being built. Explore the tutorial world to get an understanding of the game. Explore the open world to try the mechanics in a rough version of the world.
review_1: So far it’s only a tutorial but the unique inventory and crafting system makes it extremely interesting along with the creatures like the ghosts who are terrifyingly cool with their design and story I’m honestly looking forward to everything that this game is going to show!
review_2: Great little sandbox to experiment with some innovative and interesting UI Looking forward to seeing more from this developer. ￼
